duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive sales and profit strategies to achieve business goals.
Lead and manage a team of managers and partners, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set objectives.
Review and interpret financial and operational reporting regularly, including visits and audit results.
Identify underperforming metrics and develop strategies to improve and grow the business.
Ensure the proper health, appearance, welfare, and proper handling of all animals.
Maintain the Pet Care Center's appearance adhering to operational standards and safety procedures.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (GED). Bachelor's degree in Business or related field preferred.
